attributes.action: Remove the Tax exempt status from all religious institutions within the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All recent polls show that only 30-40% of people within the U.K are religious.
Now is the time too remove the Tax exempt status for all charitable donations on all religious instituitons.
Or we should get Tax exempt status for the Flying Spaghetti Monster religion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
